title: What is the impact of digital technology on the advertising industry? - Quora

response.answer_text: Digital Technology has bought a revolution in the advertising industry. It has totally changed the way how the product or service is presented or advertised in the market. Advertising using digital technology generally includes various sources like E-mail, online advertising, social media, banner ads on mobile and web, video ads and much more. Various platforms of Digital Marketing, not only helps the seller to connect with the audiences but it also helps them to keep them updated about the trends and changes. Now gradually all the companies have shifted to Digital Marketing which not only helps them to advertise their product but also captures a huge market and survive the tough competition.
